@graph.name: Merchant Cash Advance - BitX Funding
@graph.description: BitX Funding is a lending partner that offers true Merchant Cash Advance with automatic fixed or percentage of sales daily or weekly payments via ACH Debit from merchant’s business bank account . If you're looking to finance a project that has an immediate return on investment such as updating or refreshing your location, inventory deals with a quick turnaround, marketing campaigns, seasonal hiring, or high demand inventory a Merchant Cash Advance loans are for you. They range from $5,000 to $500,000 with terms of 6 to 18 months and the cost of capital varies by term. Call to find out today if you are pre-approved.

amount.name: Estimated loan 10% of your annual revenue

availableChannel.name: BitX Funding - Small Business Loans and Business Lines of Credit
availableChannel.description: BitX Funding is your online marketplace for alternative small business loans and business insurance. From SBA, start-up lines of credit, short-term loans, mid-term loans to merchant cash advances and business lines of credit, BitX is where lenders compete for your business. Our top-rated lenders focus on real-life business data and cash flow, which means you can qualify for small business loans even if your credit score isn't perfect. We care about small business and it's our mission to secure the right funding when you need alternative small business loans within our small business loan marketplace. Applying is Easy, Fast and Free… Get started to see what your business qualifies for!
